Welcome to Module_Web_14_MHW’s documentation!¶

Module_Web_14_MHW main¶

main.read_root()¶

Root endpoint returning a greeting message.

Returns:

dict: A dictionary containing a greeting message.

async main.startup()¶
The read_root function is a function that returns the root page of the website.

It takes in a request object and returns an HTML response with the index.html template.

Parameters:

request – Request: Pass the request object to the template

Returns:

A templateresponse object, which is a special type of response object

Doc-author:

Trelent

Module_Web_14_MHW repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactModel, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶
async src.repository.contacts.find_contact_by_email(contact_email: str, user: User, db: Session) → list[Contact]¶

Search contacts by email address.

Parameters:

  • contact_email – str: Email address to search for.

  • user – User: User object to filter contacts.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

list[Contact]: List of contacts matching the email address.

Raises:

HTTPException: If no contacts are found matching the email address.

async src.repository.contacts.find_contact_by_first_name(first_name: str, user: User, db: Session) → list[Contact]¶

Search contacts by first name.

Parameters:

  • first_name – str: First name to search for.

  • user – User: User object to filter contacts.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

list[Contact]: List of contacts matching the first name.

Raises:

HTTPException: If no contacts are found matching the first name.

async src.repository.contacts.find_contact_by_last_name(contact_last_name: str, user: User, db: Session) → list[Contact]¶

Search contacts by last name.

Parameters:

  • contact_last_name – str: Last name to search for.

  • user – User: User object to filter contacts.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

list[Contact]: List of contacts matching the last name.

Raises:

HTTPException: If no contacts are found matching the last name.

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Retrieve a single contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: ID of the contact to retrieve.

  • user – User: User object to filter contacts.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

Contact: Retrieved contact object.

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session) → list[Contact]¶

The get_contacts function returns a list of contacts.

Parameters:

  • limit – int: Limit the number of contacts returned

  • offset – int: Specify the number of records to skip

  • db – Session: Pass in the database connection to the function

  • current_user – User: Filter the contacts by user

Returns:

A list of contact

Doc-author:

Trelent

async src.repository.contacts.remove_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Remove a contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: ID of the contact to remove.

  • user – User: User object to authorize the removal.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

Contact | None: Removed contact object if successful, None if contact not found.

async src.repository.contacts.upcoming_birthdays(current_date, to_date, skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session) → list[Contact]¶

Retrieve contacts with upcoming birthdays within a specified date range.

Parameters:

  • current_date – datetime: Start date of the date range.

  • to_date – datetime: End date of the date range.

  • skip – int: Number of contacts to skip.

  • limit – int: Maximum number of contacts to retrieve.

  • user – User: User object to filter contacts.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

list[Contact]: List of contacts with upcoming birthdays within the date range.

async src.repository.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactModel, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Update an existing contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: ID of the contact to update.

  • body – ContactModel: Contact data to update.

  • user – User: User object to authorize the update.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

Contact | None: Updated contact object if successful, None if contact not found.

async src.repository.users.update_avatar(email, url: str, db: Session) → User¶

Update user’s avatar URL.

Parameters:

  • email – str: Email address of the user.

  • url – str: New avatar URL to set.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

User: Updated user object.

async src.repository.users.update_token(user: User, token: str | None, db: Session) → None¶

Update user’s authentication token.

Parameters:

  • user – User: User object to update.

  • token – str | None: Authentication token to set.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

None

Module_Web_14_MHW routes Auth¶

async src.routes.auth.confirmed_email(token: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Confirm user’s email using confirmation token.

Parameters:

  • token – str: Email confirmation token.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

dict: Confirmation message.

Raises:

HTTPException: If verification fails.

async src.routes.auth.login(body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(NoneType), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Log in an existing user and issue access and refresh tokens.

Parameters:

  • body – OAuth2PasswordRequestForm: Username and password for login.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

TokenModel: Access and refresh tokens.

Raises:

HTTPException: If provided credentials are invalid or email is not confirmed.

async src.routes.auth.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Security(HTTPBearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Refresh access token using refresh token.

Parameters:

  • credentials – HTTPAuthorizationCredentials: HTTP Bearer token credentials.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

TokenModel: New access and refresh tokens.

Raises:

HTTPException: If refresh token is invalid.

async src.routes.auth.request_email(body: RequestEmail, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Request email confirmation.

Parameters:

  • body – RequestEmail: Email address for confirmation.

  • background_tasks – BackgroundTasks: Background tasks for sending email confirmation.

  • request – Request: Incoming HTTP request.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

dict: Confirmation message.

async src.routes.auth.signup(body: UserModel, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Register a new user.

Parameters:

  • body – UserModel: User data for registration.

  • background_tasks – BackgroundTasks: Background tasks for sending email confirmation.

  • request – Request: Incoming HTTP request.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

UserResponse: User data and confirmation message.

Raises:

HTTPException: If account with provided email already exists.

Module_Web_14_MHW routes Contacts¶

async src.routes.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactModel, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Create a new contact.

Parameters:

  • body – ContactModel: Contact data for creation.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

  • current_user – User: Current authenticated user.

Returns:

ContactResponse: Created contact.

Raises:

HTTPException: If a contact with the same email or contact number already exists.

async src.routes.contacts.find_contact(contact_first_name: str = Query(None), contact_last_name: str = Query(None), contact_email: str = Query(None), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Search contacts by first name, last name, or email.

Parameters:

  • contact_first_name – str: First name of the contact.

  • contact_last_name – str: Last name of the contact.

  • contact_email – str: Email of the contact.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

  • current_user – User: Current authenticated user.

Returns:

list[ContactResponse]: List of matching contacts.

Raises:

HTTPException: If no search parameters are provided.

async src.routes.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int = Path(PydanticUndefined), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Retrieve a contact by its identifier.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: Identifier of the contact.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

  • current_user – User: Current authenticated user.

Returns:

ContactResponse: Retrieved contact.

Raises:

HTTPException: If contact with provided ID is not found.

async src.routes.contacts.get_contacts(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Retrieve a list of contacts.

Parameters:

  • skip – int: Number of records to skip.

  • limit – int: Maximum number of contacts to retrieve.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

  • current_user – User: Current authenticated user.

Returns:

list[ContactResponse]: List of contacts.

async src.routes.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Get a list of contacts with upcoming birthdays within the next 7 days.

Parameters:

  • skip – int: Number of records to skip.

  • limit – int: Maximum number of contacts to retrieve.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

  • current_user – User: Current authenticated user.

Returns:

list[ContactResponse]: List of contacts with upcoming birthdays.

async src.routes.contacts.remove_contact(contact_id: int = Path(PydanticUndefined), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Remove a contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: Identifier of the contact to remove.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

  • current_user – User: Current authenticated user.

Returns:

None

Raises:

HTTPException: If contact with provided ID is not found.

async src.routes.contacts.update_contact(body: ContactModel, contact_id: int = Path(PydanticUndefined), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Update an existing contact.

Parameters:

  • body – ContactModel: Contact data for update.

  • contact_id – int: Identifier of the contact to update.

  • db – Session: Database session object.

Returns:

ContactResponse: Updated contact.

Raises:

HTTPException: If contact with provided ID is not found or a contact with the same email or contact number already exists.

async src.routes.contacts.upload_file(file: UploadFile = File(PydanticUndefined))¶

Module_Web_14_MHW routes Users¶

async src.routes.users.get_my_user(my_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Get the details of the currently authenticated user.

Parameters:

my_user – User: Current authenticated user.

Returns:

UserResponse: Details of the authenticated user.

async src.routes.users.upload_avatar(file: UploadFile = File(PydanticUndefined), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Upload a new avatar for the authenticated user.

Parameters:

  • file – UploadFile: Avatar image file to upload.

  • user – User: Current authenticated user.

  • db – AsyncSession: Async database session object.

Returns:

UserResponse: Details of the user after updating the avatar.
